channel.title: How can the server
channel.description:
hi!
i got a question
how i do that the server automaticly every 35 sec says the forum link
so i dont need to say it all the time
THx!

item.title: How can the server
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

in my opinion that’s very annoying to the users and many would feel pressured enough if pushed to join a forum would just leave the game completely. However, if your server is using Events, it would be simple. If you have a class like EventManager, then you’ll have events … It’s not recommended to do that in process(), etc.

Read full topic
